alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 11:29PM MDT until July 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until midnight MDT. * At 1128 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hasty, or 16 miles west of Lamar, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR WEST PROWERS AND EASTERN BENT COUNTIES. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Prowers and eastern Bent Counties, including the following locations... Caddoa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for southeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
